original_text: And they have gathered together the money that was found in the house of the Lord, and have delivered it into the hand of the overseers, and to the hand of the workmen.
korean_text: 또 여호와의 전에서 발견한 돈을 쏟아서 감독자들과 일꾼들에게 주었나이다 하고

sentences.original_text: And they have gathered together the money
that was found in the house of the Lord
and have delivered it into the hand of the overseers
and to the hand of the workmen
